buildCommand: git config --global --add safe.directory '*' && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter build web --release --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
installCommand: git config --global --add safe.directory '*' && curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.27.1-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter config --no-analytics && flutter pub get
